comment: This is a very dark day for the UK , which I fear will not exist for very much longer . For myself , I am glad that I left when I did . Then I look at my coffee cup , which was a gift from my students . /
amr:
# ::snt This is a very dark day for the UK , which I fear will not exist for very much longer . For myself , I am glad that I left when I did . Then I look at my coffee cup , which was a gift from my students . /
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / day
            :ARG1-of (d2 / dark-02
                  :degree (v / very))
            :beneficiary (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "UK"))
            :domain (t / this)
            :ARG1-of (e / exist-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1-of (f / fear-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i))
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (l / long-03
                              :ARG1 e)
                        :ARG3 (m2 / more
                              :quant (m3 / much
                                    :degree (v2 / very))))))
      :snt2 (g / glad-02
            :ARG0 (l2 / leave-11
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :time (l3 / leave-11
                        :ARG0 ii2))
            :ARG1 (ii3 / i))
      :snt3 (l4 / look-01
            :ARG0 (ii4 / i)
            :ARG1 (c2 / cup
                  :mod (c3 / coffee)
                  :poss ii4
                  :ARG1-of (g2 / gift-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (s / study-01
                                    :ARG1 ii4))
                        :ARG2 ii4))
            :time (t2 / then)))

comment: I fear how this may translate into the US elections next year . If the racist pig wins , and I may consider moving to Barcelona !
